Sentece: (1) WR-1065 is rapidly formed from WR-2721 and equilibrates between plasma and blood cells; (2) WR-1065 decays in plasma and blood cells with similar rapid initial half-lives of approximately 16 min; (3) WR-2721 treatment increases cysteine in plasma and blood cells, an effect similar to that of mesna; (4) WR-2721 treatment appears to increase glutathione levels in blood cells; (5) Mesna does not have a substantial effect on the fate of WR-2721 in patients.
Title: WR-2721 (amifostine) infusion in patients with Ewing's sarcoma receiving ifosfamide and cyclophosphamide with mesna: drug and thiol levels in plasma and blood cells, a Pediatric Oncology Group study.
